title: Accessible Spreadsheet Creator
description: A description of an accessible spreadsheet

coverSheetTitle.title: Cover sheet title
coverSheetTitle.description: The title displayed in cell A1 of the workbook.

coverSheetContents.title: Cover sheet contents
coverSheetContents.description: The lines below the cover sheet title. Each can be a subtitle starting with '## ', a link in Markdown style, or just text.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: The notes each with a name that can be reffered to in double square brackets and text.

name.title: Note name
name.description: A note name (e.g. note1) that can be referred to in a sheet using double square brackets (e.g. [[note1]]).

text.title: Note text
text.description: The text that will appear on the Notes page.

sheets.title: Sheets
sheets.description: The data an metadata for the worksheets other than cover, contents and notes sheets.

sheetName.title: Sheet name
sheetName.description: The name to appear in cell A1

tableName.title: Table name
tableName.description: The name to give to the data table

sheetIntroText.title: Sheet intro text
sheetIntroText.description: Introductory text to appear below cell A2

items.title: Data column
items.description: A column with its heading, number/text style and data.

style.title: Number/text style
style.description: 'text'=text column; 'number_with_commas': integers with thousand separator; 'number_1dp': numbers to 1 decimal place

heading.title: Column heading
heading.description: Table column heading. May contain notes in double square brackets.

values.title: Column values
values.description: An array of text or numeric values
